description: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 has many memorable characters, but few might inspire as much joy as Esquie, the game's lovable giant pal who might as well be a mascot character. author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The Grand Theft Auto series does not feature kids in gameplay. It’s a golden rule for pretty much all video games that let you indiscriminately kill NPCs. So, you can understand why a seemingly innocuous screenshot released for GTA 6 that looks like it shows a kid in-game has sparked so much speculation.
title: Wait, Is That a Kid in GTA 6?

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: The tariff-induced price hikes on consoles, games, and accessories have arrived, and in an effort to make sense of it all in the wake of Xbox’s announcement, I chased down the usual conclave of analysts for comment on just what's going on, and how expensive it's going to get.
title: Microsoft Raised Xbox Console and Game Prices; Analysts Say PlayStation (and Everyone Else) Could Be Next
